author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation (Tangedco) has initiated an internal enquiry into the death of foreman S. Sivakumar in Valsaravakkam on Tuesday night.

A senior official of Tangedco said from the initial enquiries with local officials working at the site, the deceased contract worker was not wearing the safety rope belt while carrying out the repair work on the electricity pole.

Once the internal investigation about the death of Sivakumar, a resident of N.N. Kandigai in Tiruttani, is completed, compensation and other benefits would be awarded, the official added.
title: Probe begins into Tangedco foreman's death
